name: Grow your corn!
description:
Grow your corn plant to a fully grown.... Corn!

It seems Corn is not able to multitask and you have to help it get water, do photosyntheses and rotate to the sun. 

Controls:
Spacebar: Change modes between getting water and photosynthesesLeft/Right: Rotate your corn plant to the sun


Graphic Assets by Kenney

Made for Kenney Jam 2022
